svg.title: Thermodynamic Security Mathematical Framework
svg.desc: Formulas for energy requirements, ratios, and impossibility bounds.

g.text: S_thermo = E_total / E_universe ≈ 10^-4 (insufficient for reproduction attempt)
Quantum advantage offset by multi-dimensional precision coupling
Impossibility: coordinated exact environmental duplication across 12D at cryptographic precision requires synchronization beyond feasible physical bounds
